content: this text is about a civil case heard in the šiauliai district court the court ordered the defendant to pay various fees including stamp duty legal fees and court fees in the resolution of a matrimonial property case the court decided that the applicant would keep their car as personal property and the defendants land plot would become shared property the text discusses different articles from the civil code related to property division in a marriage the applicant filed for a divorce citing fault on the part of their spouse they requested to retain their surname establish their place of residence as the primary residence for their children and have regular contact with the children on weekends the court ordered the defendant to pay for the childrens expenses and maintenance the court also awarded the applicant personal property and determined the division of joint property the court addressed the issue of creditors and ordered the defendant to fulfill their obligations the court granted the applicant full exemption from stamp duty costs and ordered the defendant to pay the remaining costs the court allowed the action to dissolve the marriage and awarded the car to the applicant as personal property the land plot became the personal property of the defendant the defendant was ordered to pay stamp duty and legal aid costs these payments should be made to the state tax inspectorate

metadata.cost: 244.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 247.00 EUR (legal fees) + 10.34 EUR (court fees)
